skillDetails.name: Charged Anomaly
skillDetails.description: Aura: For every 12 Charge stacks spent by an ally, it applies Chill, Shock or Weakness to a random enemy.

monstersWithSkill.skillDescription: Aura: For every 12 Charge stacks spent by an ally, it applies Chill, Shock or Weakness to a random enemy.
